course_description:
This course provides an introduction to finance. It addresses the theory and practice of financial management and the generation and allocation of financial resources. It has three major objectives:  
1. To provide you with a foundation in the basic concepts of finance, including the time value of money, the role of financial markets, asset valuation, portfolio theory, asset pricing, and the risk-return tradeoff. 2. To develop your skills in financial analysis, planning, and decision-making. 3. To expand your awareness of institutions and practices in business and finance.
